rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 10 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 10:20 AM, 26 June 2025(Thursday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Quezon, Batangas, Cavite, Laguna, Rizal, Bulacan and Bataan within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Metro Manila(Mandaluyong, San Juan, Quezon City, Manila, Pasig, Makati, Taguig, Pasay) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
